verb.description: Fish with a trawl net or seine.

noun.description: An act of fishing with a trawl net.
examples: they had caught two trout on the lazy trawl

noun.description: An act of sifting through something as part of a search.
examples: we did a trawl of supermarkets and health-food stores

origin: Mid 16th century (as a verb): probably from Middle Dutch traghelen to drag (related to traghel dragnet), perhaps from Latin tragula dragnet.
